Writing Studio

Mako Writer

AI book-writing studio for fiction and non-fiction teams. Plan faster, draft cleaner, and ship manuscripts with a workflow that feels like a focused product, not a pile of disconnected tools.

What makes it different

  • • Built for long-form writing, with project-level structure for chapters, arcs, and revisions.
  • • AI assistant that works inside your manuscript context for drafting, rewriting, and expansion.
  • • Professional export path for deliverables and publishing-ready document workflows.
  • • Dedicated writing, planning, and preview modes so flow and editing stay separated and clean.

Who it is for

  • • Fiction authors building novels, series, and story-driven worlds.
  • • Non-fiction teams creating books, educational titles, and research-backed content.
  • • Creators replacing scattered notes and chat tabs with one production-ready writing stack.

Stack

Tauri React TypeScript Zustand CodeMirror Paged.js

Product direction

Mako Writer is evolving into a complete writing pipeline: idea capture, structure planning, AI-assisted drafting, and final export in one desktop environment. The goal is simple: less tool-juggling, more finished books.
